kali linux wala brodge networl daala tyeddi ip address walin google ping karanna pluywan but domain name eken karanna baha 

kali linux nat wala tyeddi pluwan 


brodge mode ekedi 

cat /etc/resolv.conf
nameserver 192.168.8.1
nameserver 2402:4000::2
nameserver 2402:4000::1

widihata thama thibbe


nat waladio 
# Generated by NetworkManager
nameserver 192.168.8.1

kiyala thama thibbe


ita passe mama ee file eka nat eke tiyena widihataba bridge eke hAduwa 
eeth hari giye naha 




ip a			gahala network interface eke nama gattha 

eeka dala 
cat /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/eth0     widihata gahhuwa

wadak un naha


dig www.google.com
meeka nm wAda kala habayi



systemctl status systemd-resolved
meka gahala mama baluwama eeka inactive
so 
systemctl start systemd-resolved

eth hari giye naha 
so mama eeka aaya stop kalaa


https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/349298/ping-works-only-with-ip-addresses-not-with-domain-names
meke palaweni uttare wada 

I opened /etc/gai.conf and added the following to the last line:

precedence ::ffff:0:0/96  100

I then created a file at /etc/sysctl.conf 
and added net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6=1 
to the last line. I then ran 
sudo sysctl -p. Then everything worked perfectly.
